appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message:
Computers can read PEM encoded certificates. Hummans cannot. This extension might help. Try out on this page http://bit.ly/2oeUwEF Select the certificate, right click and 'Print certificate contents'. 
The icon is based on Certificate By Karen Tyler https://thenounproject.com/search/?q=certificate&i=531027
